name: El Caracazo
description:
A YOUNG WOMAN WITNESSES THE DAY HER LIFE AND COUNTRY FALLS

You are a young woman student in Caracas, Venezuela. During 27 of february of 1989. Little do you know, your life is about to be thrust into turmoil as the Caracazo begins, it being a wave of protests and riots in response to the new president economic measures. The government saw the need for the military to intervene.

You must return home in a dark night on a burning city while avoiding both disgruntled protesters and armed soldiers shooting to everyone in the streets, moving obstacles into the right places in order to help you.

FEATURES

• Deal with the modern history of a currently failed state and the causes of its decline.

• Manage a young but strong woman, determined to reach her destination alive even in the eye of the storm.

• Play an top-down stealth/puzzle game that takes advantage of lighting to create unique levels.

• Walk the streets of Caracas in a cartoon but mature style that highlight the beauties and cracks of the city.

Nuno Melean (Game Designer)
Diogo Ferreira (Game Developer)
Daniel Sérgio (Game Artist)
